titles.title: To direct the Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service to conduct a study of the feasibility of establishing a national recreational fishing license.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.

bill.summary: 10/9/1997--Introduced. Mandates a study of the feasibility and desirability of establishing a national recreational fishing license for individuals 50 years old and older granting the right to fish in any State under the same conditions and restrictions that apply under State law to individuals holding licenses issued by the State. Requires the study to include development of formulas for the imposition of fees and fee allocation among States.
